Title: Open Tee Bioscope
Actors: Riddhi Sen, Surangana Banerjee, Dhee Majumder, Ritobroto Mukherjee
Plot: A rusticated boy in his adolescence comes to stay with his mother in North Kolkata and encounters some new experiences during his stay. The time-line of the story is in the 90's typical Northern part of Kolkata.
